portfolio.title: Geek Library
portfolio.description: This is a web application that allows a user to log in and request for books. The admin side can process the requests. I used Java and Javalin to create the server and springboot thymeleaf with HTML. The idea is original

portfolio.title: Calory intake calculator
portfolio.description: This is an application I built pairing with a friend, using Kotlin in Android Studio, it fetches an API on foodninja.com to display total amount of calories you have consumed. It is also original

portfolio.title: Exalt
portfolio.description: This web app is still being worked on (currently non responsive) it will allow a person to request for a maid same way as uber requests. Created with HTML and CSS (currently migrating it to Next.js). It is also original
